dialogs.line: The world is on a brink of collapse.
Once fertile, land became barren.
The sun, known as a beacon of life before, became a sign of terror.
The temperature is unbearable.
Living beings live in constant fear and seek shelter from a blazing light.
A few wealthy nations have used technology to save a portion of the planet and make it habitable once more.Â
Those who have been unfortunate enough to remain on a dead wasteland are furious.
They invade and pillage settlements to stay alive for another day.
Desperation and madness follows them, slowly infecting society.
Yet amongst these exhausted, desperate people, hope remains.
The smartest people of Earth are trying to find a solution to end desertification and drought.
Settlements unite with each other for peace and prosperity.
And there's progress in saving the world.
I'm Robert. Employee of Ecology Restoration Program.
This story is how I'd witnessed the End.
Case #23. Main river of the region.
Big funnel in the water.
There will be no river soon.
And without water, nearest ecosystem will die.
Isaac has a nice collection of rust.
I've seen this crystals many times.
But I don't know anything about them.
Ah. Here you are.
It's great to see you, Isaac.
We're running out of time, Robert.
I'm listening.
Come here. It's in the water.
Okay.
I've never seen anything like it.
I wish I could say the same.
Why? Have you seen...?
It happens in regions where people die from hunger and disease.
In this day and age fresh water is scarce resource.
And this 'phenomenon' makes situation worse and worse.
So, you've been outside?
Yes. And it was eye-opening...
The good thing about a starving person is that he's not a hypocrite.
You are aware of his main desire, which makes manipulating him very easy.
That's how our politician deals with them.
Give food supplies to the most cruel person of them all.
Make people envy his power.
And he will do anything to keep them under control.
I've heard about warlords.
I know there's chaos outside.
We are developing tools to help people out there.
But we need to save and protect ourselves first.
Or there will be no more us and no more them.
Death is all around us.
But don't you feel like it's wrong to have a feast when your neighbor is dying of malnutrition?
Maybe. I don't know.
That's what we doing.
Worse, we have convinced ourselves that these people are terrible when, in fact, only we are...
No empathy among us.
Sir, you must be fun at parties.
No. I hate parties.
So, what can we do with this anomaly?
Well, that's only an assumption but I've found a pattern.
It happens quite often near the salt energy generators.
Probably, mineral projectors absorb water in gigantic quantities.
See those blue objects laying around?
Yeah, they are, like, everywhere..
These blue crystals are connected to our problem.
I'm studying them, and maybe we'll have answers soon.
Are you sure in this hypothesis?
Certainty is a luxury I don't have.
But we're lucky that there's one station nearby.
You should visit it today.
Maybe you will learn something there.
I despise new technology.
It violates all physical laws that humankind has discovered so far.
Science 2.0, they say.
It reminds me of the Roman Empire, when it was divided in two.
The East and the West.
Division. It happens all the time.
I never thought there would be so much sects in the science community.
This division is only likely to be exacerbated further.
The truth is rarely pure and never simple.
Who knows which secrets will be found in the future?
And, surely, there will be new ways of looking at everything. Always.
You should go now.
Main Office of the Ecology Restoration Program.
Is it a life-or-death situation or are you just plain dumb?
Huh?
You're parked on the wrong side, pal.
You wouldn't do that if there wasn't something urgent. Would you?
Nah, I just felt breaking the law.
It often happens when I see bunch of coyotes on my parking lot.
Coyotes? You spelled the word 'grizzlies' wrong.
Being fat doesn't make you a grizzly.
Look. Another guy with mentality of a criminal!
I'm not the one who kills innocent and robs the poor in favor of establishment.
You think you're tough.
Look around you - if outsiders are comin', you will come begging us to help you!
Oh, you protect no one but the big guys.
We, ordinary people, have to defend ourselves alone.
From all of you.
The Bad guys... The 'Good' guys. You're all are wrongdoers.
Haha. Funny.
You won't be protected from anyone by the tiny weenie you're carrying, buddy.
We'll see about that.
Let's take a visit to his house someday. We'll see how tough he is.
He's not worth it, pal. Let the coward act as if he has guts.
You are too soft, Markus.
Remember, pal. We're always watching.
Hey. Are you working here?
Just a visitor.
What's your name?
Joe.
And surname?
Average.
W-what?
Bullshit!
Just kidding. It's Bloggs.
Don't play games with us!
Okay. Can I go now?
Get lost.
Hi, Robert!
Hello, Chris.
Who are those guys outside?
Border Control and two FBI agents.
What do they need?
They were digging information about locals.
Someone had crossed the border?
I don't know, but they're furious and think that we were involved.
What interesting times we live in.
You need to tell them everything you know. We all did.
They wouldn't bear my intellect, Chris.
Is Sarah in the office today?
Sarah the Witch?
Yeah. But I don't use that nickname.
She's there.
You are the only person around here who actually likes her.
I respect her. She has a good heart despite who she's pretending to be.
Oh, and I thought outsiders are delusional...
Sarah.
You're late. Again.
I know. Sorry.
Did you get what causes anomaly?
Isaac has a theory.
According to him, salt generator is the problem.
Salt generator? Hmm...
We have no one with expertise in salt technology.
Do we need mr. moneybags' approval so much?
We can study new tech by ourselves.
Stop!
You know where I stand on this topic!
Yeah. Whatever.
I will investigate the station.
Don't rush as you usually do.
Near the Salt-Energy Generator Station.
LINE1
Hello?
I don't want to get lost in this forest.
I should stick to the road.
F - turn on flashlight.
Enemies can hear you. Press <color=lightgreen>SPACE</color> to move quietly.
Flashlight's battery is gone.
I need a <color=blue>new one</blue>.
<color=red>Dead</color> corpse...
Torso is covered in <color=red>blood</color> but I don't see any wounds.
Weird looking pyramid made from stone.
How can anyone construct this in forest?
Several <color=red>dead bodies</color>.
All floor is covered in <color=red>blood</color>.
How did they die?
Campfire.
Locked.
Dead chickens locked in a crate...
Lit torch.
Empty crates.
It looks like there was a fight...
Who are you guys?
We? We're Nobody.
You... look dangerous.
I saw the bodies.
You're doing something illegal, aren't you?
Is survival illegal here?
If you're crossing the border without permission, then yes.
And who are you, buddy?
I'm an average guy who does science for a living.
Where I came from there's no survival without guts and struggle.
Do you have what it takes to survive, science-boy?
CATCH HIM!
NOW!
My head...
Where am I?
Main Laboratory of the Salt-Energy Station.
There's <color=blue>documents and blueprints</color> hanging on the wall near the door.
I took pictures with my smartphone.
This <color=blue>documents</color> tells that those crystals are key to restoring the environment.
Chemicals inside them can help to ease the <color=orange>climate damage</color> and bring back <color=lightblue>fresh water.
This knowledge could have<color=lightgreen> a big impact on people's lives.
If we are able to repair the environmental damage we have caused,
Then we could <color=lightgreen>bring life</color> back to the wastelands...
Sarah will be pleased.
*beep*
*Cough*
Shit. You're still alive.
Take me... to the hospital...
Impossible.
This place is surrounded by raiders.
*Cough*
They want to take over the city...
We should inform... the goverment.
Shouldn't Border Control handle this?
Invaders. They have... a big army.
They were preparing... for war since...
*Cough*
Since what?
Damnit.
The door had just closed!
What the hell?
I should get out of here.
They are close...
Main Office of the Ecology Restoration Program.
Oh, no.
Sarah...
I'll inform authorities about crystals.
She'd want that, for sure.
I have a meeting with Governor.
I'll give him all the information I collected.
I was waiting for you, Robert.
I thought you have fled the city.
Are you kidding, Robert?
I'll be with my city till the end.
Okay.
Do you have any proof of the theory?
I have photos of the lab with all the blueprints.
Give it to me.
What will you do with this?
Like we always do. Save the world.
And what happens to our city?
It'll be liberated.
Outsiders can't hold it that long.
And we know what they need.
We'll give them supplies and they go.
They've killed a lot of people.
I know. Savages.
What can we do?
We'll outgrow them.
We don't have numbers, but we have technology.
Believe me.
I've lost many friends.
I want retribution.
Patience is a key.
We will act when the time is right.
Meet me here at sunday.
Will you still be here?
Of course!
Okay.
Six days later.
It's time to meet governor.
No electricity.
Outsiders took care of it recently.
The building is empty...
They were never going to help the city.
They fled with all the photos and blueprints.
People with plastic hearts.
Lied to me, left city to die.
I'm such a fool.
What was I even thinking?
I need to speak with Isaac.
He is the only one I can trust.
Isaac's home.
Well, how did it go?
Governor didn't show up.
Whole place is abandoned.
Never trust a wretched person...
You've learned that the hard way.
He's probably at another city. Having a comfortable life.
In the meantime, city is suffering from thirst and hunger.
And this is only few weeks under occupation.
It horrifies me that this is only the beginning.
It's the first time I've witnessed a public execution.
I've also seen a lot of deaths and suffering after the invasion.
The worst is yet to come.
So, what's next in your plan?
I'd like to gather more information about warlords.
Well, good luck to you.
It's too late to save the planet.
We were doomed long before droughts happened.
I just hope humanity survives long enough...
You know, to leave this dead atmosphere.
And find a new home... to shatter it as previous one.
We are the destroyers of the world.
No one is coming to save us.
We are left alone here.
Orphans of the Earth.
Do I have nerves to kill?
Deadly weapon.
Now I'm dangerous.
Kill or be killed.
Survival of the fittest.
**Examine**
**Pick up**
**Talk**
It's early to leave yet.
I'm ready to go.
Sarah is waiting for my report.
I'm ready to go.
